title: Multiplication of a matrix with a "column vector"
content: The module of ` n ` -dimensional "column vectors" over a ring ` r ` is the ` n ` -dimensional free module over a ring ` r `, which is the product of ` n ` -many copies of the ring with componentwise addition and multiplication. Although a "column vector" could also be defined as n x 1 -matrix (according to Wikipedia "Row and column vectors", 22-Feb-2019, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Row_and_column_vectors : "In linear algebra, a column vector [[... ] is an m x 1 matrix, that is, a matrix consisting of a single column of m elements"), which would allow for using the matrix multiplication ~ df-mamu for multiplying a matrix with a column vector, it seems more natural to use the definition of a free (left) module, avoiding to provide a singleton as ` 1 `-dimensional index set for the column, and to introduce a new operator ~ df-mvmul for the multiplication of a matrix with a column vector. In most cases, it is sufficient to regard members of ` ( ( Base `` R ) ^m N ) ` as "column vectors", because ` ( ( Base `` R ) ^m N ) ` is the base set of ` ( R freeLMod N ) `, see ~ frlmbasmap . See also the statements in [Lang] p. 508.

blocks.name: cmvmul
blocks.content: Syntax for the operator for the multiplication of a vector with a matrix.

blocks.name: df-mvmul
blocks.content: The operator which multiplies an M x N -matrix with an N-dimensional vector. (Contributed by AV, 23-Feb-2019.)

blocks.name: 1mavmul
blocks.content: Multiplication of the identity NxN matrix with an N-dimensional vector results in the vector itself. (Contributed by AV, 9-Feb-2019.) (Revised by AV, 23-Feb-2019.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: mvmumamul1
blocks.content: The multiplication of an MxN matrix with an N-dimensional vector corresponds to the matrix multiplication of an MxN matrix with an Nx1 matrix. (Contributed by AV, 14-Mar-2019.)

  adantr(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, emptycls)))), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(co(c7, cgsu, cmpt(hs0, c0, co(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmulr, c7), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))), co(c7, cgsu, cmpt(hs0, c0, co(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmulr, c7), co(cv(hs0), c2, emptycls))))))
  oveq2d(c7, cgsu, cmpt(hs0, c0, co(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmulr, c7), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs0, c0, co(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmulr, c7), co(cv(hs0), c2, emptycls))), wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, emptycls)))))
  mpteq2dva(hs0, c0, co(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmulr, c7), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), co(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmulr, c7), co(cv(hs0), c2, emptycls)), wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, emptycls)))))
  oveq2d(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmulr, c7), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), c2, emptycls), wa(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, emptycls)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  imp(wa(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, emptycls)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), c2, emptycls)))

  eqcomd(co(c7, cgsu, cmpt(hs0, c0, co(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmulr, c7), co(cv(hs0), c2, emptycls)))), co(cv(s1), co(c4, c6, c2), emptycls), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  mamufv(hs0, cv(s1), c4, c6, c2, emptycls, c7, c0, cfv(cmulr, c7), c3, csn(emptycls), c8, crg, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c7))

thm mvmumamul1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ))‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((c4[c5]c1)` s1)=(s1[(c4[c6]c2)]‚àÖ))))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(c7[maMul]< c3, c0, { ‚àÖ } >)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(c7[maVecMul]< c3, c0 >)
  ‚ä£ c8 =(Base ` c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7 ‚àà Ring)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà Fin)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Fin)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà(c8[‚Ü¶](c3 √ó c0)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(c8[‚Ü¶]c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(c8[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó { ‚àÖ })))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ))‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((c4[c5]c1)` s1)=(s1[(c4[c6]c2)]‚àÖ)))), d(s0, w0))
  ex(w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((c4[c5]c1)` s1)=(s1[(c4[c6]c2)]‚àÖ)))
  ralrimiva(s1, c3, (w0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ))), ((c4[c5]c1)` s1)=(s1[(c4[c6]c2)]‚àÖ))
  3eqtrd(((c4[c5]c1)` s1), (s1[(c4[c6]c2)]‚àÖ), (c7[gsum](hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶((s1[c4]hs0)[(√ó ` c7)](c1 ` hs0)))), (c7[gsum](hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶((s1[c4]hs0)[(√ó ` c7)](hs0[c2]‚àÖ)))), ((w0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ)))‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))
  adantlr(w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ)), s1 ‚àà c3, ((c4[c5]c1)` s1)=(c7[gsum](hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶((s1[c4]hs0)[(√ó ` c7)](c1 ` hs0)))))
  mvmulfv(hs0, c4, c5, c1, s1, c7, c0, (√ó ` c7), c3, c8, crg, (w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))
  adantr(w0, s1 ‚àà c3, c1 ‚àà(c8[‚Ü¶]c0))
  adantr((w0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ))), s1 ‚àà c3, (c7[gsum](hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶((s1[c4]hs0)[(√ó ` c7)](c1 ` hs0))))=(c7[gsum](hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶((s1[c4]hs0)[(√ó ` c7)](hs0[c2]‚àÖ)))))
  oveq2d(c7, cgsu, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶((s1[c4]hs0)[(√ó ` c7)](c1 ` hs0))), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶((s1[c4]hs0)[(√ó ` c7)](hs0[c2]‚àÖ))), (w0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ))))
  mpteq2dva(hs0, c0, ((s1[c4]hs0)[(√ó ` c7)](c1 ` hs0)), ((s1[c4]hs0)[(√ó ` c7)](hs0[c2]‚àÖ)), (w0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ))))
  oveq2d((s1[c4]hs0), (√ó ` c7), (c1 ` hs0), (hs0[c2]‚àÖ), ((w0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ)))‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0))
  imp((w0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ))), hs0 ‚àà c0, (c1 ` hs0)=(hs0[c2]‚àÖ))
  adantl(w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ)), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(c1 ` hs0)=(hs0[c2]‚àÖ)))
  rspccv(s0, c0, hs0, (c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ), (c1 ` hs0)=(hs0[c2]‚àÖ))
  eqeq12d((c1 ` s0), (s0[c2]‚àÖ), (c1 ` hs0), (hs0[c2]‚àÖ), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c1)
  oveq1(s0, hs0, c2, emptycls)
  adantlr(w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ)), s1 ‚àà c3, (c7[gsum](hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶((s1[c4]hs0)[(√ó ` c7)](hs0[c2]‚àÖ))))=(s1[(c4[c6]c2)]‚àÖ))
  eqcomd((c7[gsum](hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶((s1[c4]hs0)[(√ó ` c7)](hs0[c2]‚àÖ)))), (s1[(c4[c6]c2)]‚àÖ), (w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))
  mamufv(hs0, s1, c4, c6, c2, emptycls, c7, c0, (√ó ` c7), c3, { ‚àÖ }, c8, crg, (w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))
  eqid((√ó ` c7))
  adantr(w0, s1 ‚àà c3, c7 ‚àà Ring)
  adantr(w0, s1 ‚àà c3, c3 ‚àà Fin)
  adantr(w0, s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà Fin)
  a1i((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3), { ‚àÖ } ‚àà Fin)
  snfi(emptycls)
  adantr(w0, s1 ‚àà c3, c4 ‚àà(c8[‚Ü¶](c3 √ó c0)))
  adantr(w0, s1 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà(c8[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó { ‚àÖ })))
  simpr(w0, s1 ‚àà c3)
  a1i((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3), ‚àÖ ‚àà { ‚àÖ })
  snid(emptycls)
  0ex()
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ)))
  diff.wral.s(s1, s0, c0, (c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (c1 ` s0), (s0[c2]‚àÖ))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, s0, c2, emptycls)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c1 ` hs0), (hs0[c2]‚àÖ))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, hs0)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, c2, emptycls)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c({ ‚àÖ })
}

blocks.name: mavmumamul1
blocks.content: The multiplication of an NxN matrix with an N-dimensional vector corresponds to the matrix multiplication of an NxN matrix with an Nx1 matrix. (Contributed by AV, 14-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm mavmumamul1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, emptycls))), wral(s1, c0, wceq(cfv(co(c3, c4, c1), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), co(c3, c5, c2), emptycls)))))
  -| wceq(c6, co(c0, cmat, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c7, cmmul, cotp(c0, c0, csn(emptycls))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c7, cmvmul, cop(c0, c0)))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, crg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c8, cmap, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c8, cmap, cxp(c0, csn(emptycls)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mvmumamul1(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  eleqtrrd(c3, co(c8, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), cfv(cbs, c6), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c8, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), cfv(cbs, c6)), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c7, crg))
  matbas2(c0, c7, crg, c8, c6)
}

thm mavmumamul1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 ` s0)=(s0[c2]‚àÖ))‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((c3[c4]c1)` s1)=(s1[(c3[c5]c2)]‚àÖ))))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(c0[Mat]c7)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(c7[maMul]< c0, c0, { ‚àÖ } >)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c7[maVecMul]< c0, c0 >)
  ‚ä£ c8 =(Base ` c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7 ‚àà Ring)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Fin)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(Base ` c6))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(c8[‚Ü¶]c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(c8[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó { ‚àÖ })))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mvmumamul1(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  eleqtrrd(c3, (c8[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó c0)), (Base ` c6), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c8[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó c0))=(Base ` c6), c0 ‚àà Fin, c7 ‚àà Ring)
  matbas2(c0, c7, crg, c8, c6)
}
